resolution_description: Implement a blockchain-based review verification system where consumers earn tokens for submitting verified experiences, incentivizing authenticity and making fake reviews economically disadvantageous.

required_participants.reasoning: The founders of the startup are crucial as they possess the vision, technical expertise, and strategic direction needed to implement the blockchain-based review verification system. Their commitment and leadership will be vital to drive the project forward.

Tourist customers are essential for the success of the review system. Their active participation in submitting verified experiences will ensure a diverse and authentic pool of reviews, incentivizing more users to engage with the platform.

Restaurants are key stakeholders in the review ecosystem. Their buy-in is necessary for the system's acceptance and integration, as they will benefit from authentic reviews that enhance their reputation and attract more customers.

Investors are important for securing the necessary funding and resources to develop and scale the blockchain-based review verification system. Their support can also lend credibility to the initiative, attracting more participants and users.

resolution_description: Implement a global "Reviewer Residency Program" in hotels, where randomly selected guests are offered complimentary stays in exchange for providing real-time, verified reviews, creating a trusted network of authentic feedback directly from the source.
